HPI 8120 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R32) 1990 Fuji Inter-Tec 500km (JTC Round 6) DNF K. Shimizu/M. Kageyama

Purchased: 2015
Manufacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/en/line_up/index_8120.php

For the last race of the 1990 JTC series, the Object T team total changed the livery on their R32. It was now yellow on blue instead of the other way 'round. Unfortunately the car only lasted for 31 laps and was a DNF. You can see the car in action in the brief race highlights here: Group-A History 1985-1993 The Battle In Gr.A by Trampio/Toyo Tires - YouTube

Masahiko Kageyama finished the season in 10th place overall while Kazuo Shimizu finished in 18th place overall.
